comp1206.sushi.server

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockServer

    public interface ServerInterface

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ServerInterface.UnableToDeleteException
      Throw an unable to delete exception with a given message if a deletion cannot occur

      • loadConfiguration

        void loadConfiguration(java.lang.String filename)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Given a configuration file, populate the module appropriately
        Parameters:
        filename - configuration file to load
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if unable to load given file

      • setRestockingIngredientsEnabled

        void setRestockingIngredientsEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable automatic restocking of ingredients. When restocking is disabled, no restocking by drones of ingredients should take place.
        Parameters:
        enabled - set to true to enable restocking of ingredients, or false to disable.

      • setRestockingDishesEnabled

        void setRestockingDishesEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable automatic restocking of dishes. When restocking is disabled, no restocking by staff of dishes should take place.
        Parameters:
        enabled - set to true to enable restocking of dishes, or false to disable.

      • setStock

        void setStock(Dish dish,
              java.lang.Number stock)
        Set the current stock of a given dish directly
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to set the stock
        stock - stock amount

      • setStock

        void setStock(Ingredient ingredient,
              java.lang.Number stock)
        Set the current stock of a given ingredient directly
        Parameters:
        ingredient - ingredient to set the stock
        stock - stock amount

      • addDish

        Dish addDish(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String description,
             java.lang.Number price,
             java.lang.Number restockThreshold,
             java.lang.Number restockAmount)
        Add a new dish to the system
        Parameters:
        name - name of dish
        description - description of dish
        price - price of dish
        restockThreshold - minimum threshold to reach before restocking
        restockAmount - amount to restock by
        Returns:
        newly created dish

      • removeDish

        void removeDish(Dish dish)
         throws ServerInterface.UnableToDeleteException
        Remove a dish from the system
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to remove
        Throws:
        ServerInterface.UnableToDeleteException - if unable to delete a dish

      • addIngredientToDish

        void addIngredientToDish(Dish dish,
                         Ingredient ingredient,
                         java.lang.Number quantity)
        Add an ingredient to a dish with the given quantity. If the ingredient exists already, update with the newly given values.
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to edit the recipe of
        ingredient - ingredient to add/update
        quantity - quantity to set. Should update and replace, not add to.

      • removeIngredientFromDish

        void removeIngredientFromDish(Dish dish,
                              Ingredient ingredient)
        Remove an ingredient from a dish
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to edit the recipe of
        ingredient - ingredient to completely remove

      • setRecipe

               java.util.Map<Ingredient,java.lang.Number> recipe)
        Set the recipe for a given dish to the suppliest map of ingredients and quantity numbers
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to modify the recipe of
        recipe - map of ingredients and quantity numbers to update

      • setRestockLevels

        void setRestockLevels(Dish dish,
                      java.lang.Number restockThreshold,
                      java.lang.Number restockAmount)
        Set restocking levels for the given dish
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to modify the restocking levels of
        restockThreshold - new amount at which to restock
        restockAmount - new amount to restock by when threshold is reached

      • getRestockThreshold

        Get the restock threshold for a given dish
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to query restock threshold of
        Returns:
        the restock threshold

      • getRestockAmount

        java.lang.Number getRestockAmount(Dish dish)
        Get the restock amount for a given dish
        Parameters:
        dish - dish to query restock amount of
        Returns:
        the restock amount, which will be restocked on reaching threshold

        Returns:
        the mapping of ingredients to quantity amounts

      • addIngredient

        Ingredient addIngredient(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String unit,
                         Supplier supplier,
                         java.lang.Number restockThreshold,
                         java.lang.Number restockAmount)
        Add a new ingredient
        Parameters:
        name - name
        unit - unit
        supplier - supplier
        restockThreshold - when amount reaches restockThreshold restock
        restockAmount - when threshold is reached, restock with this amount
        Returns:
        new ingredient

        Parameters:
        drone - drone to check progress of
        Returns:
        null if not travelling, or a number 0-100 of progress towards destination

      • addUpdateListener

        void addUpdateListener(UpdateListener listener)
        Add a new update listener to the client. This should be notified when any model changes occur that require the UI to update.
        Parameters:
        listener - An update listener to be informed of all model changes.

      • notifyUpdate

        void notifyUpdate()
        Notify all listeners of a model update. This is primarily used to update the UI after changes have been made.
